sect1.title: OpenLink BPEL Process Manager Debugger Console Response message
sect1.para: This page shows information about the Response message.

simplelist.member: To discard the Response message from the Debug message queue click "Discard".
To view the operation for the Response message check the value for "Initial Operation" field.
To view Response message SOAP Envelope format review the presented xml in the white area.
To return back to Debug message queue page click "Back".
